definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: the night opens the flowers in secret and allows the day to get thanks.
sentences.chinese: 夜機密地把花開放了，卻讓白天去接收謝詞。

sentences.english: The night opens the flowers in abstruse and acquiesces the day to get acknowledgment.
sentences.chinese: 夜機密地把花凋謝了，卻讓文日去領蒙謝詞。

sentences.english: The usual many thanks, expressed in varying tones of appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 一貫的感謝詞，以各式各樣的感謝語表答了。

sentences.english: Speakers alternate between giving personal testimonials and descriptions of research into mind-control technology.
sentences.chinese: 發言者陸續致感謝詞及對大腦控制技術的研究。
